front.lore: Elite troop force assigned to Massassi Base in the jungles of Yavin 4. Responsible for monitoring the perimeter of the Rebel outpost.

front.title: •Yavin 4: Briefing Room
front.gametext: Light:  If you control, with a leader here, may add 1 to total of Attack Run.  Dark:  If you control, Force drain +1 here and subtract 1 from total of Attack Run.

front.title: •Yavin 4: Docking Bay
front.gametext: Light:  Your docking bay transit from here is free.  Dark:  Your docking bay transit from here requires 2 Force.

front.title: •Yavin 4: Jungle
front.gametext: Light:  A Rebel alone here battles at power +2 and is immune to attrition.  Dark:  If you control, Force drain +1 here.

front.title: •Yavin 4: Massassi Headquarters
front.gametext: Light:  May not be separated from interior Yavin 4 sites. If you control, Attack Run total is +2.  Dark:  May not be separated from interior Yavin 4 sites. If you occupy, Attack Run total is -4.

front.title: •Yavin 4: Massassi Ruins
front.gametext: Light:  If you control, with a leader here, your starships are each power +1 at Death Star system.  Dark:  If you control, Force drain +1 here.

front.title: •Yavin 4: Massassi Ruins (V)
front.gametext: Light:  If Yavin 4 'blown away', Force loss is reduced by 4.  Dark:  If Yavin 4 system on table, Force drain -1 here.

front.title: •Yavin 4: Massassi Throne Room
front.gametext: Light:  If this is your starting location, Light Side goes first in game.  Dark:  If you control, Force drain +1 here.

front.title: •Yavin 4: Massassi War Room
front.gametext: Light:  If you control, with a leader here, all Stormtroopers and TIEs on table are forfeit -1.  Dark:  If you initiate a battle here, add one battle destiny.

front.title: •Yavin 4: Massassi War Room (V)
front.gametext: Light:  Once per game, may deploy a Rebel leader here from Reserve deck; reshuffle.  Dark:  Opponent's characters here are immune to Set For Stun.

front.title: •Yavin Sentry
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy at any Yavin 4 site. Declare one of the following to affect that site and adjacent sites while 'sentry' present: Opponent's deploy +1. OR Opponent's ability required for battle destiny +1. OR Your total power +1.
front.lore: Rebel sentries are stationed on raised sensor platforms. On watch for Imperial scouts and other hazards, they supplement data gathered by Yavin Base's main sensors.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Yavin Sentry + Grondorn Muse
rulings: Increases the typical '4 ability' requirement for drawing battle destiny.
Also increases any special requirements such as on A Jedi's Strength.

front.title: •Yavin Sentry (V)
front.gametext: Plays on table. Colo Claw Fish is canceled. Opponent must first use X Force to deploy a non-unique card (except a Jawa or Tusken Raider) to a location, where X = the number of copies of that card at that location.
front.lore: Rebel sentries are stationed on raised sensor platforms. On watch for Imperial scouts and other hazards, they supplement data gathered by Yavin Base's main sensors.

rulings: This separate cost must be paid even if the card being deployed is free.

front.title: •Yerka Mig
front.gametext: Deploy at any location. You may move Mig like a character. Target an opponent's character, who may apprehend (cancel) Mig by reaching same location. Until then, during all battles at same and adjacent sites to Mig, opponent's total power is -1.
front.lore: An Imperial bureaucrat with high security clearance who resigned and fled in remorse after the occupation of his home planet, Ralltiir. Now a fugitive from the ISB.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Yoda
front.gametext: Deploy on Dagobah I must, but move elsewhere I may, yes. When the mentor, 1 to training destiny I add. Where present am I, battles and attacks happen not unless present a Dark Side character of ability > 3 there is. To attrition, immune am I.
front.lore: Help you I can, yes. For 800 years have I trained Jedi. Judge me by my size do you? Mm? And well you should not! For my ally is the Force... and a powerful ally it is.

combo: Yoda + Encampment Deploy regardless of location deployment restrictions.

front.title: •Yoda (V)
front.gametext: May deploy to Dagobah. Prevents attacks at same Dagobah site. Your training destiny draws are +1. If Great Warrior on table, once per turn may take your just-drawn destiny into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Help you I can, yes. For 800 years have I trained Jedi. Judge me by my size do you? Mm? And well you should not! For my ally is the Force... and a powerful ally it is.

front.title: •Yoda Stew
front.gametext: During opponent's turn, take up to four cards from your hand and place them on top of your Force Pile.
front.lore: 'For the Jedi it is time to eat as well.'

front.title: •Yoda Stew & •You Do Have Your Moments
front.gametext: USED: During opponent's turn, take up to 4 cards from your hand and place them on top of your Force Pile.  LOST: At the start of the damage segment during a battle, before any cards have been forfeited, cause all attrition for both sides to be reduced to 0.

front.title: •Yoda, Keeper Of The Peace
front.gametext: Deploys -1 to Coruscant. May lose 1 Force to cancel Force Lightning targeting your character present. Neither player may draw more than one battle destiny here (those destiny draws may not be modified or canceled). Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Yoda calls upon the Force often to try and foresee what destiny has in store. Jedi Council Member.

front.title: •Yoda, Master Of The Force
front.gametext: Deploys only to Naboo or Coruscant. Once per game, may take a Sense, Control, or Alter into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Your Jedi present are immune to attrition < 4 (or < 5 if a Jedi Council member). Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Jedi Council Member. 'More to say have you?'

combo: Yoda, Master Of The Force + Are You Brain Dead?! Yoda, Master Of The Force + Encampment Deploy regardless of location deployment restrictions.

front.title: •Yoda, Senior Council Member
front.gametext: Deploys only to Jedi Council Chamber. While at Jedi Council Chamber, you lose no Force from Dagobah: Cave and, during your move phase, may use 4 Force to relocate your other Jedi here to any site you occupy. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member. Responsible for the early training of Obi-Wan Kenobi. When Qui-Gon brought Anakin before the Council, Yoda voted not to train the boy.

combo: Yoda, Senior Council Member + Coruscant: Jedi Council Chamber For Force activation.
Yoda, Senior Council Member + Speak With The Jedi Council
Yoda, Senior Council Member + Are You Brain Dead?!
Yoda, Senior Council Member + Encampment Deploy regardless of location deployment restrictions.

front.title: •Yoda, Senior Council Member (AI)
front.gametext: Deploys only to Jedi Council Chamber. While at Jedi Council Chamber, you lose no Force from Dagobah: Cave and, during your move phase, may use 4 Force to relocate your other Jedi here to any site you occupy. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member. Responsible for the early training of Obi-Wan Kenobi. When Qui-Gon brought Anakin before the Council, Yoda voted not to train the boy.

front.title: •Yoda, You Seek Yoda
front.gametext: If Yoda is lost, use 1 Force to retrieve him from the Lost Pile. OR Use 3 Force to search through your Reserve Deck and take Yoda into your hand. Shuffle, cut and replace.
front.lore: 'Take you to him I will.'

front.title: •Yoda's Gimer Stick
front.gametext: Deploy on Yoda.  You may initiate battles and attacks where present.  OR  Use 2 Force to deploy on one of your characters of ability > 3.  Immune to attrition.  Where present, no battles or attacks may be initiated unless an opponent's character of ability > 3 present.
front.lore: A symbol of the Jedi Master and his ancient wisdom. Speak softly you may but a big stick you must carry, yes.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Yoda's Hope
front.gametext: Deploy on a character. When on the mentor, adds 1 to training destiny draws. If on Yoda, you may lose Effect to search your Reserve Deck and take into hand one card with 'levitation' in the title. Shuffle, cut and replace.
front.lore: 'You must feel the Force around you. Here, between you, me, the tree, the rock, everywhere! Yes, even between the land and the ship.'

pulls: One card with 'levitation' in the title
pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Yotts Orren
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Opponent's combat vehicles are each power -2 at same site. Once per game, may take Mechanical Failure and/or Free Ride into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Kadas'sa'Nikto. Smuggler who stole from shipments going in and out of Jabba's Palace. Part of Jabba's sail barge crew. Not trusted by anyone.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)

front.title: •You Assume Too Much
front.gametext: Deploy on table. If no senator here, you may place a senator here from hand to draw two cards from top of Reserve Deck. If an order or rebellion agenda here, once during your draw phase may place all cards on your Political Effects in Used Pile.
front.lore: 'This is your arena. I feel I must return to mine.'

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: You Can Either Profit By This... / Or Be Destroyed
front.gametext: You Can Either Profit By This...:Deploy Tatooine:Jabba's Palace and Audience Chamber (with Han frozen there, he may not be moved when frozen). Opponent may deploy up to two aliens at Audience Chamber.{While} this side up, opponent may not Force Drain at Audience Chamber and you may not Force drain at Tatooine locations. You may not play Frozen Assets. Luke, C-3PO and R2-D2 are deploy -2 at Jabba's Palace sites (Master Luke deploys for free instead).{Flip} this card if Han is on Tatooine and not a captive.{Place} out of play if Tatooine is 'blown away.'Or Be Destroyed:{Immediately} retrieve 5 Force (or 10 if Han has power < 4) once per game.{While} this side up, cancels the game text of Bad Feeling Have I. Your unpiloted starfighters may deploy to exterior Tatooine locations. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each battleground location occupied by Han, Luke, Leia, Chewie, or Lando.{Flip} this card if Han is captured or not on table.{Place} out of play if Tatooine is 'blown away.'

back.title: You Can Either Profit By This... / Or Be Destroyed
back.gametext: You Can Either Profit By This...:Deploy Tatooine:Jabba's Palace and Audience Chamber (with Han frozen there, he may not be moved when frozen). Opponent may deploy up to two aliens at Audience Chamber.{While} this side up, opponent may not Force Drain at Audience Chamber and you may not Force drain at Tatooine locations. You may not play Frozen Assets. Luke, C-3PO and R2-D2 are deploy -2 at Jabba's Palace sites (Master Luke deploys for free instead).{Flip} this card if Han is on Tatooine and not a captive.{Place} out of play if Tatooine is 'blown away.'Or Be Destroyed:{Immediately} retrieve 5 Force (or 10 if Han has power < 4) once per game.{While} this side up, cancels the game text of Bad Feeling Have I. Your unpiloted starfighters may deploy to exterior Tatooine locations. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each battleground location occupied by Han, Luke, Leia, Chewie, or Lando.{Flip} this card if Han is captured or not on table.{Place} out of play if Tatooine is 'blown away.'

front.title: •You Do Have Your Moments
front.gametext: At the start of the damage segment during a battle, before any cards have been forfeited, cause all attrition for both sides to be reduced to zero.
front.lore: Sarcastic, Sardonic, Irreverent. Impertinent. Exasperating. Disrespectful. Outrageous and charming. Han was a scoundrel but Leia began to realize that she loved him.

front.title: •You Do Have Your Moments (V)
front.gametext: USED: Cancel and redraw a just drawn destiny.  LOST: A just drawn battle destiny is +3.
front.lore: Sarcastic, Sardonic, Irreverent. Impertinent. Exasperating. Disrespectful. Outrageous and charming. Han was a scoundrel but Leia began to realize that she loved him.

front.title: You Have Failed Me For The Last Time
front.gametext: If Vader is on table when opponent has just initiated a battle, target one opponent's leader of ability < 6 involve in that battle. If opponent does not win battle, target is forfeit = 0 and is immediately lost (placed out of play if Ozzel).
front.lore: 'Lord Vader, the fleet has moved out of lightspeed and we're preparing to aah...ukh...uh...uuuuukkk!'

front.title: You Must Confront Vader
front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Target a Skywalker who has completed Jedi Test #5.  While target on Dagobah, 'move phase' on Save You It Can may be treated as 'deploy phase.'  Until Jedi Test completed, battles you initiate at Vader's site are canceled and opponent loses 2 Force at start of your turn unless Vader is at a battleground site.  Attempt during your move phase when Vader with target (even as a non-frozen captive).  Vader and target duel: Each player draws destiny.  Add ability.  Highest total wins.  If target wins, test completed:  Leave on table.  Add one battle destiny in every battle.  Also, target is immune to attrition < 5.

front.title: You Will Go To The Dagobah System
front.gametext: During your control phase, use 1 Force to move any one of your [Hoth] characters of ability > 1 to any [Dagobah] location where you have presence. If moving to a Dagobah site, this movement is free and you do not need presence.
front.lore: 'There you will learn from Yoda, the Jedi Master who instructed me.'

front.title: •You Will Take Me To Jabba Now
front.gametext: If Jabba is at a Jabba's Palace site, relocate one of your characters to that location from a related site. OR During your deploy phase, deploy one alien (at normal use of the Force) from Reserve Deck to the Audience Chamber; reshuffle.
front.lore: 'Et tu taka bu Jabba now.'

front.title: •You'll Find I'm Full Of Surprises
front.gametext: If Luke and Vader present at same site, use 1 Force to initiate a duel between them. Either is power +2 if armed with a lightsaber. Draw destiny. Opponent draws two destiny. Both players add power. Loser is placed out of play.
front.lore: Even though he wasn't fully prepared to face the Dark Lord of the Sith, Luke rushed to save his friends.

front.title: •Your Insight Serves You Well
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Opponent's Dark Jedi are defense value -1. Scanning Crew and 3,720 To 1 are canceled. You may place Effect in Lost Pile to take one [Endor] or [Death Star II] Effect that deploys for free into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Luke knew that while the dark side was quicker and more seductive, eventually evil would turn on itself.

pulls: One (Endor icon) or (Death Star II icon) Effect that deploys for free
Let's Keep A Little Optimism Here
pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
Your Insight Serves You Well & Staging Areas

front.title: •Your Insight Serves You Well
front.gametext: Plays on table. Cancels Scanning Crew. If an 'insert' card was just inserted or revealed, it is canceled.
front.lore: Luke knew that while the dark side was quicker and more seductive, eventually evil would turn on itself.

cards.counterpart: You Cannot Hide Forever - Defensive Shield

front.title: •Your Insight Serves You Well & •Staging Areas
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your Force generation is +1 at each docking bay you occupy. Opponent's Dark Jedi are defense value -1. Scanning Crew and 3,720 to 1 are canceled. You may place Effect in Lost Pile to take one [Endor] or [Death Star II] Effect that deploys for free into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)

pulls: One (Endor icon) or (Death Star II icon) Effect that deploys for free
Let's Keep A Little Optimism Here
pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
cards.counterpart: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points

front.title: •Your Insight Serves You Well (Death Star II) (V)
front.gametext: Plays on table. Scanning Crew is canceled. If an 'insert' card was just inserted or revealed, it is canceled. You lose no Force to Boonta Eve Podrace. While you occupy three battlegrounds, Watto's Box is suspended.
front.lore: Luke knew that while the dark side was quicker and more seductive, eventually evil would turn on itself.

front.title: •Your Insight Serves You Well (V)
front.gametext: Plays on table. Scanning Crew is canceled. If an 'insert' card was just inserted or revealed, it is canceled. You lose no Force to Boonta Eve Podrace. While you occupy three battlegrounds, Watto's Box is suspended.
front.lore: Luke knew that while the dark side was quicker and more seductive, eventually evil would turn on itself.

cards.counterpart: You Cannot Hide Forever (V) - Defensive Shield

front.title: •Your Ship?
front.gametext: Plays on table. Cancels A Dangerous Time. Each player may play only one card with 'sabacc' in title each turn. You may cancel an opponent's card with 'sabacc' in title by losing 1 Force from hand.
front.lore: Han was not sure if Lando had forgiven him for winning the Millennium Falcon. As the old gamblers' saying about sabacc goes: 'Win the game, lose a friend.'

front.title: •You're All Clear Kid!
front.gametext: Cancel I'm On The Leader. (Immune to Sense.)  OR  Use 1 Force during an Attack Run.  Move one TIE in Death Star: Trench (your choice) to Death Star system for free.  Add 1 to total of Attack Run if lead starfighter has matching pilot aboard.
front.lore: 'Now let's blow this thing and go home!'

front.title: •You've Got A Lot Of Guts Coming Here
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Unique (•) Rebels of ability = 3 are power and forfeit +1 (or power and forfeit +2 if at a Cloud City or Jabba's Palace site). While Han at a battleground, opponent retrieves no Force from Scum And Villainy. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The Empire, Lando Calrissian, Jabba the Hutt. For Han Solo, it can be very hard to tell when your past is going to catch up with you.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
cancels: Force retrieval of Scum And Villainy while Han at a battleground

front.title: •Yoxgit
front.gametext: Deploys free to a Cloud City or Jabba's Palace site. Power + 2 on Cloud City. During your control phase, may use 3 Force to search your Lost Pile and take one weapon or device into hand.
front.lore: Male Ugnaught. Left Cloud City after the Empire took control. Works for Hermi Odle, helping to supply him with various weaponry. Hopes to someday return to Cloud City.

front.title: •Yoxgit (V)
front.gametext: Deploys free to (and power +2 at) a Cloud City, Jabba's Palace, or Maz's Castle location. Once per turn, if you just drew an alien (or [Independent] starship) for destiny, may take that card into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny.
front.lore: Male Ugnaught. Left Cloud City after the Empire took control. Works for Hermi Odle, helping to supply him with various weaponry. Hopes to someday return to Cloud City.

front.title: YT-1300 Transport
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot, 2 passengers and 1 vehicle. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. Quad Laser Cannon and Surface Defense Cannon may deploy (and fire free) aboard.
front.lore: Reliable and durable. Widely used freighter made by Corellian Engineering Corporation. Sales have dramatically increased in proportion to the fame of Han Solo's ship.

front.title: •Yub Yub!
front.gametext: USED: Add 1 to forfeit of each of your Ewoks for remainder of turn.  LOST: Retrieve one card with 'Ewok' in the title. OR Cancel Dead Ewok, Imperial Tyranny or Empire's New Order.
front.lore: 'You're a jittery little thing, aren't you?'

front.title: •••Z-95 Bespin Defense Fighter
front.gametext: Permanent pilot provides ability of 1 and adds 1 to power. May add one alien pilot (suspends permanent pilot). Power +2 at Bespin locations. May be carried aboard starships like a vehicle.
front.lore: Used to combat pirate activity in and around Cloud City. Top speed in atmosphere 1,150 kph. Hyperdrive installed by Bespin Motors.

front.title: Z-95 Headhunter
front.gametext: Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1. Power and Maneuver +2 at non-unique cloud sectors. May be carried aboard starships like a vehicle.
front.lore: Developed by Incom/Subpro. Atmospheric fighter adapted for space travel. AF-4 version refitted with Incom 2a fission engines and two Taim & Bak KX5 laser cannons.

combo: Z-95 + Corellian Corvette Carry a starfighter on a Light Side capital ship.
- Z-95 + Out of Nowhere Maneuver of 4 is all that is needed.

front.title: •Zeb Orrelios
front.gametext: Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots. During battle with an opponent's combat vehicle (or with two Rebels), attrition against opponent is +2. Rebels here are immune to Trample.
front.lore: Lasat.

front.title: •Zev Senesca
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Rogue 2, also adds 3 to maneuver and may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.
front.lore: Born on Kestic Station near the Bestine system. Daring pilot who can fly anything. Found Luke and Han in the Hoth wasteland. Piloted Rogue 2 at the Battle of Hoth.

front.title: •Zutton
front.gametext: Where present, just before opponent draws battle destiny, you may use 1 Force to reduce opponent's total battle destiny by 1.
front.lore: Snivvian also known as 'Snaggletooth.' A tortured artist who, like most Snivvians, is driven to live out the stories he creates.

combo: Zutton + Jeroen Webb + any Rebel leader

front.title: •Your Ship? (V)
front.gametext: Plays on table. Cancels A Dangerous Time and Imperial Supply. Each player may play only one card with 'sabacc' in title each turn. You may cancel an opponent's card with 'sabacc' in title by losing 1 Force from hand.
front.lore: Han was not sure if Lando had forgiven him for winning the Millennium Falcon. As the old gamblers' saying about sabacc goes: 'Win the game, lose a friend.'

front.title: Quite A Mercenary (V)
front.gametext: USED: Cancel Elis Helrot or Stunning Leader. (Immune to Sense) OR Cancel a smuggler's game text for remainder of turn. OR Take Mercenary Armor or [Reflections II] Chewie into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  LOST: During your move phase, 'break cover' of an Undercover spy.
front.lore: Smugglers and other rogues frequent spaceports along trade routes. 'Your friend is quite a mercenary. I wonder if he really cares about anything, or anybody.'.

front.title: •Captain Lando Calrissian
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. If a battle was just initiated here, may exchange a card in hand with an Interrupt of destiny = 4 from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Once per game, if you have completed a Kessel Run, may return Lando to hand.
front.lore: Smuggler and gambler.

front.title: •L3-37 (Elthree-Threeseven)
front.gametext: While aboard (or stacked on) a freighter, adds 1 to power, maneuver, and hyperspeed, and when forfeiting L3-37, stack her on that freighter. May lose L3-37 to cancel a non-[Immune to Sense] Interrupt targeting a freighter she is aboard or stacked on.
front.lore: Female smuggler.

front.title: •Chewbacca (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (3 if Falcon). May deploy -1 as a 'react' (-2 to same location as Han). If you have completed a Kessel Run, opponent's Force retrieval is canceled. During battle here (or at a holosite), your dejariks are destiny +2.
front.lore: Wookiee smuggler from Kashyyyk. Over 200 years old. Top-notch mechanic and pilot. Jabba has large bounty on this 'walking carpet.' Friends call him Chewie...or Fuzzball.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)

front.title: •Qi'ra
front.gametext: When forfeited at same location as Han or Vos, may satisfy all remaining battle damage against you. If you just initiated a battle or Force drain at same battleground and you have completed a Kessel Run, opponent loses 1 Force. Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Female thief. Corellian smuggler.

front.title: •Rio Durant
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per turn, if you just deployed a smuggler here, may place a card from hand in Used Pile to activate 2 Force. Once per game, if you just won a battle here, may steal a starfighter from opponent's Lost Pile into hand.
front.lore: Ardennian smuggler and thief.

front.title: •Han... Solo
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power and maneuver of anything he pilots or drives. If exactly one 'coaxium' card here, may take it into hand. While piloting Falcon and you have completed a Kessel Run, adds one battle destiny and opponent generates no Force here.
front.lore: Corellian gambler, smuggler, and thief.

front.title: •Qui-Gon Jinn, Serene Jedi
front.gametext: Once per game, may deploy Meditation on Qui-Gon from Lost Pile. If alone during battle: your total battle destiny is +1 for each weapon destiny draw that was completed while alone this battle, and opponent may not cancel your destiny draws. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Qui-Gon's sense of control assisted him in his final confrontation with Darth Maul. The ability to heal oneself in battle, mentally and physically, can be a huge advantage.

front.title: •Tobias Beckett
front.gametext: If Vos or a [Set 13] smuggler on table, destiny +3 when drawn for destiny. Cancels Aurra's game text here. If just lost, may place out of play (for remainder of game, Han adds one battle destiny). If opponent just initiated a battle here, Beckett may fire a blaster.
front.lore: Glee Anselmian smuggler. Information broker, musician, and thief.

rulings: Only causes Han to add a battle destiny if Beckett goes out of play using his own text.

front.title: •Val
front.gametext: May forfeit in place of your 'hit' [Set 13] smuggler here, restoring that smuggler to normal. Permanent weapon is Blaster Pistol (may target a character or creature for free; draw destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).
front.lore: Female scout, smuggler, and thief.

front.title: •Yoda, Master Of The Force (V)
front.gametext: Power +3 while defending a battle (or while exactly two Jedi on table). Once per game, during your move phase, may relocate to an [Episode I] battleground site as a regular move. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Jedi Council Member. 'More to say have you?'

rulings: Yoda's relocation is free.
'Two jedi' counts himself.
Relocating does not allow Yoda to embark or disembark.

front.title: •Clumsy And Stupid
front.gametext: Plays on table. Opponent's Undercover spies are immune to Nevar Yalnal. Field Promotion is canceled if on Ozzel or opponent's [Maintenance] card. If Monnok just revealed your hand, you may place up to two cards from hand in your Used Pile.
front.lore: 'Lord Vader, the fleet has moved out of lightspeed and we're preparing to aah . . . ukh . . . uh . . . uuuuukkk!'

front.title: •Kessel Run (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on Kessel; draw 'coaxium' destinies, stacking face up here until total > 12 (cannot deploy otherwise). During each move phase, if your smuggler here, move a 'coaxium' card from here to Used Pile. If no 'coaxium' cards here, retrieve 4 Force; place Effect out of play.
front.lore: Planet Kessel has infamous glitterstim spice mines attracting smugglers and pirates. A 'Kessel run' is a long, dangerous hyper-route they must travel quickly.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Meditation (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your character of ability > 3. Opponent's aliens here are power -1 (and forfeit -2 if a leader, [Maintenance], or [Permanent Weapon] card). During battle at same site, if opponent has more characters participating than you, may add one battle destiny (then lose Effect at end of battle).
front.lore: To prepare for the inevitable conflict with Jabba's minions, Luke entered a calm state of mental preparation.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •He's The Best Smuggler Around
front.gametext: USED: Take Kessel Run, L3-37, or Lando into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If you just moved a 'coaxium' card to Used Pile, randomly retrieve 1 Force. LOST: Once per game, place a card stacked on [Set D] A Useless Gesture in your Lost Pile.
front.lore: Blank

front.title: •Anakin Skywalker (V)
front.gametext: USED: Unless Twilight Is Upon Me on table, take [Cloud City] or [Endor] Leia or [Dagobah] Luke into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. LOST: During a battle at a site involving [Endor] Leia or [Dagobah] or [Death Star II] Luke, choose: Add one destiny to attrition. OR Cancel the game text of a character of ability < 4.
front.lore: 'You were right about me. Tell your sister ... you were right.'

rulings: May be played even if Vader has crossed and has taken on the card title Anakin Skywalker.

front.title: Han's Dice
front.gametext: If Han or your gambler is in battle (with no Jedi), draw destiny: (0-2) subtract that amount from opponent's total battle destiny; (3-4) cancel the game text of a character participating in battle (if any); (5+) opponent loses all immunity to attrition (if any) this battle.
front.lore: A pair of dice dangling above Millennium Falcon's cockpit, for luck. 'I've never seen anything to make me believe there's one, all-powerful Force controlling everything.'

front.title: •I've Got A Really Good Feeling About This
front.gametext: If you have two smugglers on table, choose one: If opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw one card from Reserve Deck (two if [Set 13] Han on table). OR If there are more [Dark Side] than [Light Side] on table, activate 1 Force (2 if [Set 13] Han on table). OR Re-circulate.
front.lore: Blank

front.title: •Savareen Standoff
front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated, immediately fire a blaster deployed on your smuggler present. That blaster may fire again this battle. OR Your smuggler armed with a weapon card is defense value +2 for remainder of turn (even if just targeted by an Interrupt or weapon).
front.lore: Blank

front.title: •Corellia (V)
front.gametext: Light:  Your Corellians and freighters deploy -1 here. Your starships are hyperspeed +1 when moving to or from here.  Dark:  If This Place Can Be A Little Rough on table, Force drain -1 here.

combo: Corellia + Kessel Run Because of its low parsec number, Corellia makes an ideal planet to begin a Kessel Run from.

front.title: •Death Star II: Chasm Walkway
front.gametext: Light:  While Luke alone here, he is power +2.  Dark:  Your total power here is -1 for each card stacked on I Feel The Conflict.

front.title: •Kessel
front.gametext: Light:  For remainder of game, while you occupy Kessel, Force drain +1 there and Kessel Run may not be canceled.  Dark:  If you control, Kessel Run is prevented (canceled).

combo: Corellia + Kessel + Kessel Run Because of its low parsec number, Corellia makes an ideal planet to begin a Kessel Run from.  Raltiir + Raltiir Freighter Captain + Kessel + Kessel Run: Raltiir Freighter Captain doubles X on Kessel Run

front.title: •Leia's Resistance Transport
front.gametext: May add 2 pilots and 5 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Deploys and moves like a starfighter. When deployed, may deploy a female Resistance character aboard for free from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Blank

front.title: Rock
front.gametext: Ewok weapon. Deploy on your warrior or Ewok. May 'throw' (place in Used Pile) to target a character. For remainder of turn, target is power -3 (and if Proxima, she cannot battle). If on a Corellian and a battle just initiated at same site, may 'throw' Rock.
front.lore: Blank

front.title: •Red 12
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. If Puck Naeco piloting, he may be placed in Used Pile instead of Lost Pile when he is forfeited. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Blank.

pulledBy: All Wings Report In & Darklighter Spin

front.title: •Puck
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When choosing the destiny value of this card, must use 3 Force to choose 7. May deploy as a 'react.' Your Rebel pilots aboard snub fighters here are forfeit +1.
front.lore: Puck Naeco. Green and Red Squadron.

front.title: •Beaumont Kin
front.gametext: At same and related locations, deploy cost of opponent's characters may not be modified. If you have ten cards in Lost Pile, Force drain +1 here. Once during battle, may add Beaumont's power to another character present; Beaumont is 'hit.'
front.lore: Blank

front.title: •Corporal Pao
front.gametext: Power +1 while with Melshi or Sefla. During battle, may add X (limit 3) to a just drawn battle destiny, where X = number of your spies out of play. If just lost from a site, may draw cards from Reserve Deck until you have up to six cards in hand.
front.lore: Drabatan trooper.

front.title: •Din Djarin
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While with an alien, adds one battle destiny. Once per turn, may target opponent's non-'hit' character here. If Din on table when target lost this turn, choose: retrieve 1 Force or place target in Used Pile to retrieve 2 Force.
front.lore: Mandalorian.

front.title: •Rey, All Of The Jedi
front.gametext: Once during your control phase, may search your Lost Pile and choose two cards; opponent places one out of play (retrieve the other). Once per game, may deploy a lightsaber on Rey from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Female.

front.title: •Our Only Hope (V)
front.gametext: Relocate Prophecy Of The Force to a site. OR If He Is The Chosen One or He Will Bring Balance on table, take Yoda's Hut or a Death Star II site into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

front.title: Alter & Friendly Fire (V)
front.gametext: This Interrupt is immune to opponent's Objective and does not cause you to lose Force to There Is No Try. USED: Cancel Sense. LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Utinni Effect, and one of your characters on table. Draw destiny. If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled. OR If a battle was just initiated at a site where opponent has four or more characters, draw destiny. If destiny < number of opponent's characters at that site, opponent chooses one to be lost.

rulings: Cannot cancel an Immediate Effect, Mobile Effect, or Starting Effect.
Can be played as a top-level action.
Can be played as a response to the attempted deployment of an Effect, Political Effect, or Utinni Effect. If successful, the target has no result.
'Immune to opponent's Objective' only works while initiating/playing it.
It is protected from (for example) both sides of Hunt Down And Destroy The Jedi.
It is not protected from (for example) In Complete Control or I Will Make It Legal.

front.title: •Endor: Chief Chirpa's Hut (V)
front.gametext: Light: You may not generate more than 2 Force at non-battlegrounds. Ewoks deploy -2 here.  Dark: Force generation here may not be prevented by Objectives.

front.title: ARC-170 Starfighter
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Opponent may not 'react' to or from here. During battle, if about to be lost before the damage segment, lost at end of battle instead.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Odd Ball's Torrent Starfighter
front.gametext: May add 1 clone pilot. Odd Ball deploys -1 aboard. While Odd Ball piloting, power and hyperspeed +1, and adds one destiny to total power. Immune to attrition < 3 (< 5 while Odd Ball piloting).
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Plo Koon's Jedi Starfighter
front.gametext: May add 1 Jedi pilot. *Maneuver = pilot's ability. While Plo piloting, power +2, immune to attrition < 3, and once per turn, may cancel and redraw your weapon or battle destiny just drawn here.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Ahsoka's Shoto Lightsaber
front.gametext: Deploy on Ahsoka or a non-[Episode I] Padawan. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if total destiny > defense value (if hit target is an Inquisitor, opponent also loses 1 Force).
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •A Power Loss
front.gametext: Deploy on Central Core. Leia may not modify Force drains. Once per game, opponent may stack up to two cards from hand face-down here. Allow The Ship To Leave: If you just won a battle at a Death Star site (or initiated a Force drain here), place a card stacked here in owner's Lost Pile. That Old Man Did It!: If you occupy this site and another Death Star site while no cards stacked here, power 'shut down' (place this card out of play; your movement between Death Star locations is free this turn).

rulings: Causes all forms of movement between two Death Star locations to be free.
When using Nabrun Leids for free, draw destiny but do not pay any cost.
After placing this card out of play, it is possible for Light to deploy a 2nd copy of this card on Central Core later in the game.

front.title: •C-3PO (See-Threepio) (V)
front.gametext: Once per turn, may place a card from hand on Used Pile to activate 1 Force (or to take [A New Hope] R2-D2 into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle). During your control phase, if with a Rebel at an interior mobile battleground, opponent loses 1 Force.
front.lore: Cybot Galactica 3PO human-cyborg relations droid. Fluent in over six million forms of communication. 112 years old. Has never been memorywiped... as far as he knows.

rulings: The Force loss is a mandatory action initiated by Light. If not initiated, it occurs automatically at end of control phase.

front.title: •Cal Kestis
front.gametext: Once per game, if you are about to draw a card for battle destiny here, may instead use Cal Kestis's ability number. During opponent's draw phase, may place one card from your hand under Reserve Deck; reshuffle and draw top card of Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Padawan.

rulings: Cal Kestis' substituted battle destiny draw cannot be canceled, modified, or reset.
Cal Kestis' substituted battle destiny draw does not count towards limits (such as on Guri), but can only be used before such a limit has been reached.
Cal Kestis may place a card under an empty Reserve Deck (normally you will just draw it again).
Cards mentioning 'Cal' refer to Cal Alder. To refer to this character, cards will say 'Cal Kestis' instead.

front.title: •Cell 2187 (V)
front.gametext: If Leia imprisoned, deploy on table. [Set 8] Luke is a spy and stormtrooper. Han, Leia, and Luke are immune to Nevar Yalnal and Put All Sections On Alert. Once per turn, may deploy a Death Star site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to This Is Some Rescue! Immune to Alter.
front.lore: 'Aren't you a little short for a stormtrooper?'

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
rulings: This causes [Set 8] Luke to be a spy, stormtrooper, and trooper in all card states.
For example, [Set 8] Luke can be taken into hand by Ambush (V).

front.title: •Death Star: Central Core
front.gametext: Light:  If A Power Loss 'shut down' this game, Force drain +1 here and Death Star Tractor Beam lost.  Dark:  If you occupy, opponent must first use 1 Force to move a character from here.

rulings: For Dark's text, pay the additional cost even if the movement is free.
For group movement (e.g. Nabrun Leids) pay 1 per character.
Pay the additional cost when movement costs are normally paid.

front.title: •Death Star: Detention Block Corridor (V)
front.gametext: Light:  If you control with a spy, may use 2 Force to release Leia here (retrieve 1 Force).  Dark:  If Leia is about to be lost from a Death Star site, imprison her here instead (even if inactive).

rulings: When Dark's text imprisons Leia, she is restored to normal (no longer hit or forfeit = 0, etc).
When Dark's text imprisons Leia, any weapons and other cards on Leia remain on her.
When Dark's text imprisons Leia from another site, she is placed here but it is not considered movement. It is not blocked by e.g. You Are Beaten.
Dark's text does not prevent an 'all cards situation', e.g. Program Trap will make Leia go to Lost Pile.

front.title: •Death Star: Hangar 327
front.gametext: Light:  While Obi-Wan alone here, he is immune to attrition.  Dark:  While Obi-Wan alone here, Vader may not Force drain on Death Star.

rulings: Obi-Wan is 'alone' here if Light has no other characters or cards with ability here.

front.title: •Death Star: Trash Compactor (V)
front.gametext: Light:  During your move phase, you may move to here for free from any Death Star site.  Dark:  Unless you control an adjacent site, We're All Gonna Be A Lot Thinner! is canceled.

rulings: Light's text is a regular move.
Each character moving via Light's text is a separate top-level action.

front.title: •For The Republic!
front.gametext: USED: Deploy Cloning Cylinders for free from hand (or Reserve Deck; reshuffle). LOST: If a battle was just initiated at a site, each of your clones present is power +1 (+2 and immune to attrition if a Jedi there) for remainder of turn.
front.lore: Blank.

rulings: You must choose one search area (hand or Reserve Deck) when initiating this action.
Only check if a Jedi is there when initiating this Interrupt. Removing the Jedi after that point does not remove the bonus.

front.title: •Han Solo, Optimistic General
front.gametext: May be targeted instead of a Resistance character by I Want That Map. Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. [Endor] scouts are destiny +1. Cancels Kylo's game text here. During battle with Chewie or [Endor] Leia, may add one destiny to total power.
front.lore: Leader. Scout.

cancels: Kylo's game text at same location
rulings: If chosen as a Resistance Agent via I Want That Map, Han does not become a Resistance character.
Destiny to total power is drawn before battle destiny.

front.title: •Jannah
front.gametext: Other Resistance characters of destiny = 2 (and Finn) are power +1 at same and adjacent sites. During battle, if opponent has more than four characters here, may exclude one opponent's character of ability < 4 from battle.
front.lore: Female stormtrooper.

front.title: •Kashyyyk: Forest Depths
front.gametext: Light:  While you control, Wookiees are destiny +1.  Dark:  No starships or vehicles here.

rulings: 'No starships or vehicles' applies to both players.
Dark Side Wookiees such as Snoova also receive the destiny +1 bonus.

front.title: •Kashyyyk: Kachirho
front.gametext: Light:  Once per turn, if you occupy with a Wookiee, may deploy a Kashyyyk location from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Dark:  Total ability of 6 or more required for you to draw battle destiny here.

rulings: If Dark has less than 6 ability, cards that 'add a battle destiny' won't work, but cards that 'draw if unable to otherwise' will work.

front.title: •Larma D'Acy
front.gametext: Finn and Poe are power +1 here. During your control phase, if with an opponent's spy, opponent loses 1 Force (2 if spy is Undercover). While Leia present at a battleground site, Their Fire Has Gone Out Of The Universe flips and may not flip back.
front.lore: Female commander. Leader.

rulings: The Force loss is a mandatory action initiated by Light. If not initiated, it occurs automatically at end of control phase.

front.title: •Let The Wookiee Win (V)
front.gametext: USED: Subtract 2 from a just drawn destiny targeting your Wookiee's ability or defense value. STARTING: If your starting location had exactly two [Light Side], deploy a Kashyyyk location and three Effects that are always immune to Alter. Place Interrupt in Reserve Deck.
front.lore: 'It's not wise to upset a Wookiee.' 'But sir, nobody worries about upsetting a droid.' 'That's cause a droid don't pull people's arms out of their sockets when they lose.'

rulings: Works when starting Hoth: Main Power Generators (V).
Does not work with Objectives.
May not deploy fewer than three Effects.

front.title: Rescue The Princess / Sometimes I Amaze Even Myself (V)
front.gametext: Rescue The Princess:Deploy Central Core, A Power Loss, Detention Block Corridor (with Prisoner 2187 imprisoned there), and Trash Compactor.{For} remainder of game, Path Of Least Resistance is canceled. Your Death Star sites generate +1 Force for you and are immune to Set Your Course For Alderaan. Death Star sites may not be converted. You may not deploy Luke of ability > 4 or [Episode I] (or [Episode VII]) Jedi.{Flip} this card if Leia is present at a Death Star site and A Power Loss has been 'shut down' this game.Sometimes I Amaze Even Myself:{For} remainder of game, I Can't Believe He's Gone may only add power in battles involving Leia or Luke.{While} this side up, for opponent to initiate a Force drain, opponent must use +1 Force. Whenever you 'hit' a character with a blaster, opponent loses 1 Force. May place Obi-Wan out of play from a Death Star site to cancel a battle just initiated anywhere on Death Star. During opponent's draw phase, if opponent did not initiate a battle this turn, may retrieve 1 Force.{Flip} this card if Leia is not at a Death Star site.

back.title: Rescue The Princess / Sometimes I Amaze Even Myself (V)
back.gametext: Rescue The Princess:Deploy Central Core, A Power Loss, Detention Block Corridor (with Prisoner 2187 imprisoned there), and Trash Compactor.{For} remainder of game, Path Of Least Resistance is canceled. Your Force generation is +1 at your Death Star sites. Your Death Star sites are immune to Set Your Course For Alderaan. Death Star sites may not be converted. Jedi (except Obi-Wan) are lost.{Flip} this card if Leia is present at a Death Star site and A Power Loss has been 'shut down' this game.Sometimes I Amaze Even Myself:{For} remainder of game, I Can't Believe He's Gone may only add power in battles involving Leia or Luke.{While} this side up, for opponent to initiate a Force drain, opponent must use +1 Force. Whenever you 'hit' a character with a blaster, opponent loses 1 Force. May place Obi-Wan out of play from a Death Star site to cancel a battle just initiated anywhere on Death Star. During opponent's draw phase, if opponent did not initiate a battle this turn, may retrieve 1 Force.{Flip} this card if Leia is not at a Death Star site.

rulings: At Death Star sites that are 'immune to SYCFA', Dark Side's Force drains and battle damage are not canceled by SYCFA.
Excluding Leia from battle will not flip the objective back to the 0-side.
Capturing and siezing Leia (such as with IG-88 With Riot Gun) will flip the objective back to the 0-side.

On the 7-side, Leia's Blaster Rifle creates competing automatic actions. The player whose turn it is chooses whether the 1 Force loss or the character being lost happens first. If the character is lost first, the 1 Force loss does not occur.

front.title: •Slight Weapons Malfunction (V)
front.gametext: Take a Rebel stormtrooper into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel a weapon destiny targeting a stormtrooper (or Chewie). OR If a stormtrooper just fired a weapon (except a lightsaber) during battle, add one battle destiny.
front.lore: Han was gifted in the art of understatement.

rulings: The 'stormtrooper' could belong to either player.

front.title: Stolen Stormtrooper Blaster Rifle
front.gametext: Deploy on your Rebel or stormtrooper. May target a character, creature, or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Add 1 if targeting a vehicle. Target hit if total destiny +1 > defense value. If hit by Chewie or a stormtrooper, target may not be used to satisfy attrition.
front.lore: BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Standard issue for Imperial forces. So numerous that many have been stolen by Rebels. Extendable stock. Carries energy for 100 shots.

rulings: Both of the +1 bonuses on this card modify the weapon destiny total, not the individual destiny draw.

front.title: •TK-422 (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Stormtrooper. Deploys only if Cell 2187 on table. Han's weapon destiny draws are +1 for each trooper here. While with a stormtrooper (or armed with a blaster), adds one battle destiny. Cancels Trooper Assault here.
front.lore: Corellian smuggler. Spy. Han stole the armor and identity of an enemy soldier that boarded the Millennium Falcon. Bluffed his way into the detention area.

combo: TK-422 + Sabotage (V)
TK-422 + Double Agent
rulings: Counts himself as a trooper for the weapon destiny +1 bonus.
Game text referring to troopers/stormtroopers counts characters on both sides.

front.title: •Uncivilized Blaster
front.gametext: Deploy on your warrior. May target a character, creature, or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +2 > defense value. If hit by Corran, Kanan, or Obi-Wan, target may not be used to satisfy attrition, and opponent loses 1 Force.
front.lore: Blank.

rulings: Text such as Theed Palace Generator Core prevents the Force loss.
The bonus text only applies if the actual target is hit, not (for example) the captive of Dengar (V).

front.title: <>Alien Rabble
front.gametext: This card has your Rep's species. When deployed, may retrieve a Rep or place a Rep stacked on your Objective in Used Pile. Once per turn, if No Love For The Empire on table and you just retrieved Force, may place top card of Used Pile on Force Pile.
front.lore: Blank.

pulledBy: Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes & Out Of Somewhere
rulings: Rep is defined by Agents In The Court.
This card has the Rep's species in all card states, including while in hand, Reserve Deck, etc.
This card has the Rep's species even while its gametext is canceled.
When retrieving multiple Force, the once per turn action may respond to any one individual unit of retrieved Force.

front.title: •Anakin Skywalker, Jedi Knight
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. While armed with a lightsaber, adds 2 to his defense value. During battle, may lose 2 Force to add one battle destiny. Immune to attrition < 6.
front.lore: Jedi Council member

front.title: Bowcaster (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your Wookiee. If Wookiee is non-unique, adds 1 to power. May target a character or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Add 1 for each Kashyyyk location you control. Target hit and is power -3 if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Hand-crafted weapon of choice among Wookiees. Fires explosive 'quarrels' (which look like blaster bolts). Requires great strength to use. Extra ammo carried on bandoleers.

front.title: •Chewbacca, Defender Of Kashyyyk
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Your total power here is +1 for each opponent's character present. During battle, if all your ability here is provided by Yoda, smugglers, and/or Wookiees, may add one destiny to total power.
front.lore: Wookiee scout. Volunteered for Han's Endor strike team. Keeps his distance, but doesn't look like he's keeping his distance. Always thinks with his stomach.

front.title: •Communing
front.gametext: Deploy on table (only at start of game). You may not deploy Jedi with 'communing' in game text. One With The Force: If a Jedi is about to be lost (or placed out of play) from table, may stack that card here. The Living Force: Jedi stacked here are 'communing' and are considered out of play. Your total Force generation is +1 for each Jedi 'communing.' The Cosmic Force: Once per turn, may peek at the top X cards of your Force Pile or Lost Pile, where X = the number of Jedi 'communing'; may move one of those cards to the bottom of that pile.

rulings: May only deploy on table if instructed to do so, such as via I Am Part Of The Living Force.
A Jedi stacked on Communing is considered out of play, but has not been 'just placed out of play' such as for I Can't Believe He's Gone.
The objective Bring Him Before Me prevents Luke from being stacked on Communing.

front.title: •Coruscant: Jedi Temple Meditation Room
front.gametext: Light:  If Qui-Gon 'communing,' may deploy Theed Palace Generator from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Dark:  While Qui-Gon 'communing,' no Force drains here.

rulings: Light may not attempt to deploy Theed Palace Generator if it is already on table.
Light may only attempt to deploy Theed Palace Generator once per turn (during their own deploy phase).

front.title: •Dagobah: Yoda's Hut (V)
front.gametext: Light:  If Yoda here or [Set 16] Yoda 'communing,' once per turn, may subtract 2 from attrition against you.  Dark:  If Yoda here or [Set 16] Yoda 'communing,' Broken Concentration is canceled.

rulings: Declare attrition subtraction during the power segment, after all battle destinies and attrition destinies have been drawn by both players.

front.title: •Figrin D'an & •The Modal Nodes
front.gametext: Power +2 at an antechamber, bar, cantina, or night club. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. During your control phase, if you have alien characters of five different species on table, may retrieve 1 Force. Once per game, may re-circulate.
front.lore: Bith musicians. Figrin D'an, Doikk Na'ts, Ickabel G'ont, Nalan Cheel, and Tedn Dahai.

rulings: This is a character combo card. It functions as one character, one alien, one musician, etc.
This card contains all 5 of the unique personas listed in the lore box.

front.title: •Free Ride & •Endor Celebration (V)
front.gametext: Cancel Cloud City Occupation, Rebel Base Occupation, or Tatooine Occupation. (Immune to Sense.) OR During your turn, target opponent's spy (or unpiloted combat vehicle) at a site you control; target is lost. OR Cancel an attempt to deploy or move a combat vehicle as a 'react.' OR Cancel a 'react' to or from same site as Leia or Luke.

cancels: Reacts to or from same site as Leia or Luke
rulings: This may target an Undercover spy.

front.title: •Grogu
front.gametext: While defending a battle, Interrupts may not be played unless they are [Immune to Sense]. Opponent may not target Grogu with weapons unless each of your Mandalorians and non-[Episode I] Jedi present are 'hit.' Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Blank.

rulings: If an Interrupt is partially immune to Sense, only the immune functions may be played.

front.title: •••Heavy Infantry Mandalorian
front.gametext: May 'fly' (landspeed = 3). May move as a 'react.' Permanent weapon is Flamethrower (may target a character or creature for free; draw destiny; target hit if destiny +1 > defense value).
front.lore: Blank.

rulings: This card's text allows it to move to a battle as a react, not away from a battle as a react.

front.title: •Jedi Holocron
front.gametext: Deploy on your character of ability > 4. While present: adds 1 to training destiny draws and Force drains here; the first Force lost to a Force drain here is stacked here face down; opponent's ability required to draw battle destiny here is +1 for each card stacked here.
front.lore: Blank.

rulings: If a player loses Force from hand to stack here, it is first revealed to both players.
If a player loses Force from Life Force to stack here, it is not revealed.
Increases the typical '4 ability' requirement for drawing battle destiny.
Also increases any special requirements such as on A Jedi's Strength.
A training destiny draw is 'at' the location of the apprentice.

front.title: •Kashyyyk: Sacred Falls (Forest)
front.gametext: Light:  Your Wookiees move from here for free when using landspeed.  Dark:  While opponent occupies with a Wookiee, your Force generation here is canceled.

rulings: Dark's text does not cancel the icon, so Light can still Force drain and Dark can still deploy.

front.title: •Kashyyyk: Work Settlement #121
front.gametext: Light:  While you occupy, your Wookiees at Kashyyyk sites are forfeit +1.  Dark:  While you control, opponent's Wookiees at Kashyyyk sites are power -1.

front.title: •Ketwol (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Your docking bay transit is free when moving to or from same site. If piloting a freighter or starfighter, may lose 1 Force to cancel an attempt by opponent to target that starship to be captured, 'hit,' or lost.
front.lore: Pacithhip scout. From an unknown system on the Outer Rim. Spends most of his time talking to pilots and travelers at local docking bays.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)

front.title: •Lando, Hero Of The Rebellion
front.gametext: Adds one destiny to total power with Chewie or Jannah (or while piloting). During your turn, may reveal the top three cards of your Reserve Deck, take one starship with a deploy cost < 6 into hand (if possible), and shuffle your Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Leader. Resistance Agent.

front.title: •Master Kenobi
front.gametext: While 'communing': You may not deploy Jedi (except Yoda) or [Permanent Weapon] cards; if a Rebel in battle, may use 1 Force to add 3 to your total power (5 if Luke); once per turn, may deploy a battleground that is related to a location on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: 'Luminous beings are we, not this crude matter.' The inner consciousness of a Jedi can transcend even death.

rulings: You may not persona replace a character if the new version would violate this card's deployment restrictions.

front.title: •Master Qui-Gon Jinn, An Old Friend
front.gametext: While 'communing': You may not deploy Rebels; Jedi Council members are destiny +1; your total power in battles is +1 for each Jedi 'communing'; once per turn, may place a card from hand on Used Pile to draw top card of Force Pile.
front.lore: Blank.

rulings: You may not persona replace a character if the new version would violate this card's deployment restrictions.

front.title: •Master Yoda
front.gametext: While 'communing': You may not deploy Jedi Knights or [Maintenance] cards; [Dagobah] Luke is deploy -1 and power and defense value +1; once per turn, may deploy a battleground with two [Dark Side] from Reserve Deck; reshuffle; once per game, may retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: Blank.

rulings: You may not persona replace a character if the new version would violate this card's deployment restrictions.

front.title: •I Am Part Of The Living Force
front.gametext: If your starting location had 'communing' in game text, deploy Communing and stack a Jedi with 'communing' in game text on it. Deploy up to three Effects that deploy on table and are always immune to Alter. Place Interrupt in Lost Pile.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: ••Offworld Jawas
front.gametext: Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. If you just verified opponent's Reserve Deck, may use 1 Force to search that Reserve Deck and place one device, weapon, or unpiloted starship there in Lost Pile; reshuffle. If none there, opponent loses 1 Force.
front.lore: Jawa. Scavenger. Thief.

front.title: •Paige Tico
front.gametext: Adds 1 to weapon destiny draws and defense value of anything she is aboard as a passenger. While out of play, adds 1 to your total power where you have a Resistance character of ability = 2. If just lost, may place her out of play.
front.lore: Female gunner.

rulings: To place her out of play using her game text, she must be lost from an active or inactive state on table - not from hand or Life Force.

front.title: •Tarfful
front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated at same site, may name an Interrupt; for remainder of battle, Interrupts with that title may not be played unless they are [Immune to Sense]. Once per game, if Yoda about to be lost, may place him in owner's hand instead.
front.lore: Wookiee leader.

rulings: If the chosen Interrupt is partially immune to Sense, only the immune functions may be played.

front.title: •Tatooine: Obi-Wan's Hut (V)
front.gametext: Light:  If Obi-Wan 'communing,' once per turn, may subtract 2 from a just drawn [Permanent Weapon] weapon destiny.  Dark:  While Obi-Wan 'communing,' no Force drains here.

front.title: •This Is Where The Fun Begins
front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated, each of your [Republic] starfighters present is power +1 and immune to attrition for remainder of turn. OR If Anakin and Obi-Wan are in a battle together, cancel one opponent's destiny just drawn (except a battle destiny).
front.lore: Blank.

rulings: The first function only affects piloted Republic starfighters (landed starfighters are not piloted).
To play the first function of this Interrupt, Light must be able to target at least one piloted Republic starfighter in the battle.

front.title: •Wookiee Guide (V)
front.gametext: If opponent just initiated battle at an Endor or Kashyyyk site (or any forest), move your non-unique Wookiee there as a 'react.' OR deploy a Wookiee to a Kashyyyk site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Activate 1 Force for each Kashyyyk location you occupy.
front.lore: Chewie felt right at home in the forests of Endor, which closely resemble the environment on his homeworld of Kashyyyk.

front.title: •Wookiee Homestead
front.gametext: Deploy on Kachirho. Your Wookiees deploy -1. If you have two Wookiees in battle, draw one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. While your Wookiee alone here, [Dark Side] icons here are canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Blank.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Wookiee Roar (V)
front.gametext: When drawn for destiny, once per turn, choose one of your Wookiees to be power +1 for remainder of turn. If a battle was just initiated involving your Wookiee, add one destiny to total power. OR Cancel an attempt by opponent to target your Wookiee to be lost or captured.
front.lore: 'GHRRRRAARRRRHG!'

rulings: Plays against Hidden Weapons during the response step, preventing the Hidden Weapons destiny from being drawn.
Only cancels the attempt, so for example Hidden Weapons still goes to Used Pile.
Using the first sentence of this card's text when drawn for destiny is not considered to be 'playing' the Interrupt.

front.title: •••Wookiee Warrior
front.gametext: During battle at a site, may add one destiny to total power. Once during battle, unless 'hit,' may lose this character to restore your 'hit' character here to normal.
front.lore: Blank.

rulings: If K'lor'slug (V) is on table, attempting to use this card's text to lose itself will fail to restore the 'hit' character to normal, but will still cause Wookiee Warrior to be lost at end of battle per K'lor'slug (and if forfeited, forfeit for 0).

front.title: •Yarua (V)
front.gametext: If drawn for destiny, each of your Wookiees is power +1 for remainder of turn. Agenda: taxation. At Kashyyyk sites where you have two Wookiees present and your total power > 10, your Force drains are +1.
front.lore: Kashyyyk's senior Wookiee senator. Believes that a thorough taxation plan will assist funding of other worthwhile Republic programs. Despises the corruption around him.
